intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to Sanatana Dharma (sanatanadharmam.in). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our website. This Privacy Policy explains our data practices, including what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your personal information.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.lead: We may collect the following types of information:
informationWeCollect.usage: Information about how you interact with our website, including pages visited, time spent, and links clicked.
informationWeCollect.device: Details about your device, browser type, IP address, and operating system.
informationWeCollect.cookies: We use cookies and similar technologies to remember your preferences and language selection.
informationWeCollect.contact: If you submit a form or contact us, we collect the information you voluntarily provide.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.lead: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Improving and personalizing your website experience
Remembering your language preference and settings
Analyzing website performance and user behavior
Responding to your inquiries and feedback

cookiesLocalStorage.title: 4. Cookies and Local Storage
cookiesLocalStorage.text: We use browser local storage to remember your selected language preference. This data is stored only on your device and is not transmitted to our servers. You can clear this data anytime by clearing your browser's local storage.

thirdParty.title: 5. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: We may use third-party analytics services to understand website usage patterns. These services may collect anonymous data about your visit. We do not share personally identifiable information with third parties without your consent.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.text: We are committed to protecting your information through appropriate technical and organizational security measures. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. If you have concerns about security, please contact us.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.lead: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal information
Right to request correction of inaccurate data
Right to request deletion of your data
Right to opt-out of certain data processing activities
rights.contactText: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.text: Our website is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child under 13, we will promptly delete such information.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this policy. Your continued use of the website following the posting of revised Privacy Policy means that you accept and agree to the changes.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.lead: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
contact.closing: By accessing and using Sanatana Dharma, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy.
